title: Purchase Commodities
description: You can spend RP to Purchase Commodities, but doing so is more expensive than gathering them or relying upon trade agreements. When you Purchase Commodities, select the Commodity you wish to purchase (Food, Lumber, Luxuries, Ore, or Stone). @lose8ResourcePoints if you’re purchasing Luxuries or @lose4ResourcePoints if you’re purchasing any other Commodity. Then attempt a basic check.

criticalSuccess.msg:
You immediately gain 4 Commodities of the chosen type:

  • @gain4Food
  • @gain4Ore
  • @gain4Lumber
  • @gain4Stone
  • @gain4Luxuries

and 2 Commodities of any other type (except Luxuries):

  • @gain2Food
  • @gain2Ore
  • @gain2Lumber
  • @gain2Stone

success.msg:
You gain 2 Commodities of the chosen type.

  • @gain2Food
  • @gain2Ore
  • @gain2Lumber
  • @gain2Stone
  • @gain2Luxuries

failure.msg:
You gain 1 Commodity of the chosen type.

  • @gain1Food
  • @gain1Ore
  • @gain1Lumber
  • @gain1Stone
  • @gain1Luxuries
